sheet_title: New 2nd Fl. ADU Plan w/ Schedules
description: 2nd floor ADU floor plan with window schedule, door schedule, bedroom egress standards, glazing notes, means of egress, drainage notes, wall covering notes, attic access requirements, smoke alarm notes, CO alarm notes, shower/bath notes, plumbing fixture notes, clothes dryer exhaust ducting notes, floor plan legend, and electrical symbols legend. Red 'APPROVED' stamp present.
key_content: Floor plan: 2nd floor ADU above existing garage — bedroom, bathroom, kitchen/living open studio, closet, staircase entry
Window schedule: 5 entries — vinyl windows, tempered glass at sliding and select locations, sizes include 3'x4'
Door schedule: 3 entries — (A) front door w/ security lock wood, (B) interior panel door w/ privacy lock wood, (C) sliding closet door
Min. bedroom egress: 5.7 sq.ft. net clear opening, 24" min height, 20" min width, 44" max sill height
Glazing: safety glazing required at human impact locations, within 18" of floor, shower/tub enclosures
Smoke alarms: required in each sleeping room, outside each sleeping area, on each story — interconnected with battery backup
CO alarms: required outside each sleeping area, on every level — hardwired with battery backup
Combination smoke and CO alarm: hardwired w/ battery back-up
Plumbing fixtures: water closets max 1.28 GPF, lavatory faucets per code flow rates
Shower/bath: cement, glass, plastic or non-absorbent finish, tub walls to 70", backflow prevention required
Clothes dryer exhaust: independent duct system, per manufacturer installation instructions
Attic access: required for areas exceeding 30 sq.ft. with 30" clear height, min opening 22" x 30"
Wall covering: weather-resistant exterior envelope, interior finishes per R805
Drainage: lots graded to drain surface water away from foundation walls
Electrical symbols legend: GFCI outlets, smoke detectors, CO detectors, combination smoke/CO, range outlet, dryer outlet, LED can lights, exhaust fans, panel
NOT SHOWN: specific room dimensions (dimension strings too small to read precisely)
NOT SHOWN: window U-factor and SHGC values
NOT SHOWN: plumbing fixture GPM flow rates for faucets/showerheads
NOT SHOWN: fire-rated wall callouts (1-HR assembly)
NOT SHOWN: electrical panel location on floor plan
NOT SHOWN: kitchen ventilation range hood CFM
NOT SHOWN: ceiling height

drawing_zones.content: (N) 2nd Floor Plan ADU — bedroom, bathroom, kitchen/living open studio, closet, staircase entry, with dimension strings and fixture locations
Window Schedule table (5 entries) — SYM, SIZE, THK, GLAZING, MATERIAL, TYPE, REMARKS columns
Door Schedule table (3 entries) and Min. Bedroom Egress Standards (5.7 sq.ft., 24" H, 20" W, 44" sill)
Floor Plan Legend, Clothes Dryer Exhaust Ducting notes
Smoke Alarm Notes (4 items, interconnected) and Carbon Monoxide Alarm Notes
Shower / Bath Notes (5 items including backflow prevention, non-absorbent materials)
Glazing notes, Means of Egress, Miscellaneous, Drainage, Wall Covering, Attic Access notes
Plumbing Fixture Notes (1.28 GPF water closets, drain/sewer connections, future water use)
Electrical Symbols Legend — wall lights, recessed lights, outlets, GFCI, switches, smoke/CO detectors, range/dryer outlets, exhaust fans, panel
Red APPROVED stamp — Anthony Mirtney, Building Plan Check
Title block (rotated vertical): NEW ADU ABOVE (E) GARAGE, 326 FLINT AVE UNIT A, LONG BEACH CA 90814, PAGE A2, Ideal Designs
